name: google-sheets
description: Google Sheets integration for financial modeling, budgeting, pipeline tracking, and data analysis. Enables agents to create and update live spreadsheets with formulas, charts, and linked sheets.
use_cases: P&L projection with monthly Year 1 detail and quarterly Years 2-5
Cash flow analysis with runway calculation and breakeven date
Cap table modeling with pre-seed, seed, and Series A dilution scenarios
Unit economics dashboard (CAC, LTV, LTV:CAC ratio, payback period)
Hiring plan with fully-loaded costs by role and quarter
Sensitivity analysis with variable stress testing across scenarios
Sales pipeline model with conversion rates and monthly revenue forecast
Marketing budget allocation tracker with ROI per channel
Compensation calculator with OTE, base/variable splits, and commission tiers
team_integration: The CFO is the primary user, producing the complete financial model as a multi-sheet Google Sheets workbook. VP Sales uses it for pipeline models and compensation calculators. The CMO references it for marketing budget tracking. During Phase 6 artifact generation, the CFO creates the final formatted workbook with formulas, conditional formatting, charts, and a summary dashboard sheet. All financial figures in the business plan and pitch deck trace back to this single source of truth.

sheets_structure.summary_dashboard: Key metrics overview with charts -- MRR, runway, burn rate, LTV:CAC
sheets_structure.p_and_l: Revenue and expense projection with monthly Year 1, quarterly Years 2-5
sheets_structure.cash_flow: Monthly cash inflows and outflows with ending balance and runway
sheets_structure.cap_table: Founder equity, option pool, and funding round dilution scenarios
sheets_structure.unit_economics: CAC, LTV, payback period, contribution margin by segment
sheets_structure.hiring_plan: Role-by-role timeline with fully-loaded costs and cumulative headcount
sheets_structure.sensitivity: Key variable stress testing with best/base/worst case scenarios
sheets_structure.pipeline_model: Sales pipeline stages with conversion rates and revenue forecast
sheets_structure.marketing_budget: Channel-by-channel budget allocation with projected and actual ROI

read: All agents during Phase 3-6 for cross-functional validation
write: VP Sales (pipeline and compensation sheets only)
